review_title: Green job at the heart of the international Geneva
cons: Low first salary but opportunity to grow

pros: Good cause, contributing something for the farmers
cons: Low salaries, workload, travel, not having benefits

pros:
- Good cause
- Ability to work remotely most of the week
cons:
- Super unorganised
- Some upper management people are plain rude and self-centered
- No constructive feedback
- Some people seem to think it is OK to belittle others, talk behind their backs, etc.
- No feeling of community and working together for the greater good
- No consideration for one's feedback and suggestions

Overall, there are a few very nice people in the organisation but too many overcomplicated, immature, and unreasonable people make it a very negative and unwelcoming place to work in.

pros: Travel anywhere with an enormous travel budget for all
cons: No real sustainability goals. Smoke and mirror marketing

pros: flexible work, great work ethics, supportive team
